data.description: Find a path through linked elements in a set
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module allows for a set with linked items to be searched for a
    path. The easiest explanation is to say it's similar to the Six
    Degrees of Kevin Bacon game.

    I've implemented just the back-end algorithm in this module, and so
    I believe it belongs in Algorithm::.

    I've checked CPAN, and I haven't found anything similar to this.
